item.title: Podcast: Building And Shipping Flask Side Projects Fast With Abhishek Kaushik
item.description:
Description

Abhishek built creatorlist and ficate.xyz with Flask. In this session we chat with him about the passion and challenges of side projects!
item.dc:creator: Various

item.title: Podcast: Experience Learning Flask With David Carmichael
item.description:
Description

David talks about his experience learning Flask and about what he currently does with Flask. He's come a long way!
item.dc:creator: Various

item.title: Podcast: How To Leverage Flask To Win Hackathons by Anush Krishna V
item.description:
Description

Anush won many hackathons. His university team came out in the top 5 for IBM's call of code. His wins includes those organised by Microsot and Stanford x Yale. In this session we ask him about his journey and the secret to crack hackthons.
item.dc:creator: Various
